parameter.name: configLevel
parameter.description: configLevel of operation - BASIC or ADVANCED

parameter.name: title
parameter.description: Title of the spreadsheet (Required for BASIC configLevel)

parameter.name: initialSheetName
parameter.description: Name of the first sheet (Optional for BASIC configLevel)

parameter.name: spreadsheetId
parameter.description: Unique identifier of the spreadsheet (For ADVANCED configLevel)

parameter.name: properties
parameter.description: Properties of the spreadsheet (For ADVANCED configLevel)

parameter.name: sheets
parameter.description: List of sheets and their properties (For ADVANCED configLevel)

parameter.name: namedRanges
parameter.description: Create names that refer to cells (For ADVANCED configLevel)

parameter.name: fields
parameter.description: Fields to include in partial response

parameter.name: responseVariable
parameter.description: Name of the variable to store operation output

parameter.name: overwriteBody
parameter.description: Replace Message Body with operation output
